name: saas-ai-assistant
description: AI WhatsApp Assistant - نظام مساعد ذكي متطور يدمج الذكاء الاصطناعي مع WhatsApp

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../frontend-simple && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.pm2:start: pm2 start apps/backend/simple-server.js --name saas-ai-bot && pm2 start apps/backend/bot-manager.js --name bot-manager
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run pm2:restart
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd apps/backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
